mapper.select: select food_review.frev_no as frev_no, food.foodname as foodname, food_review.faddress as faddress, food_review.score as score, food_review.content as content, food_review.fooddate as fooddate, food_review.id as id from food_review join food on food_review.faddress = food.faddress where food_review.faddress = #{faddress} order by food_review.frev_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into food_review values((SELECT NVL(MAX(frev_no), 0) + 1 FROM food_review), #{faddress}, #{score}, #{content}, (select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual), #{id})
